title: Aagaayam Ithanai Naal Lyrics Unakkum Enakkum
stanzas:
Aagaayam ithanai naal
manmeedhu veezhaamal
thoonaaga thaanguvadhu
kadhal thaan

aandaandu kaalangal
boologam poo pookka
azhagaana kaaraname
kadhal thaan

panja boothangal yaavum
kadhalin adimai
naatkal aezhum kadhalin
kizhamai
onbadhu kolgalum
kaadhalai suttri varum

maram yaera yaeniyai
thanthaal malai yaeri
kodi yaetrum
kundoosi kayyil thanthaal
kinare thondi vidum

verungallai vairakkallaai
kadhal paarvai maatri vidum
venneeril vittaal kooda
kadhal meen neendhum

Kashtam kadhaluku ishtam
vettri pera vendum endral
kadhal edhaiyum thaangidume

muttu kadhavugalai thattum
sarukki varum padhai ellaam
vetri padiyaai maatridume

idhu neruppil seitha
irumbu valaiyamae
irumanam virumbi
thunindhu nulaiyume
bayangalum thayakkamum
vidumurai eduthidume

veraodu verai oottri
kadhal endrum vendruvidum
veriyodu oadum podhu
thadayai udaithu vidum

kadal neerai thaekkum podhu
uppaai thaane maari vidum
kanneerai thaekkum kadhal
muththaal maatri vidum

Kadhal kaetukondu varumaa
thottathil paravai vandhaal
vaeli enna thaduthidumaa

kadhal, kaattu sedi pole
kattalaigal potta podhum
pookkal pookka maruthidumaa

puli vazhum guhai ullae
kizhi vazhum veerathai
manadhodu thandhidume
kadhal thaan.

idhu pogum vazhiyo
vethhu paadhai
thirumbum vazhiyo
vetri paadhai

kadhal thaandum pravaikellaam
vazhiyil marangal kidaiyaadhu
aanaalum kandam thaandum
siragugal valikkaadhu

malai aerum erumbin kaalgal
veliyil miththu udaiyaadhu
manadhodu kadhal vanthaal
manithaa thadai yaedhu.

seo.description: Get the complete Aagaayam Ithanai Naal Lyrics Unakkum Enakkum from Unakkum Enakkum. composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by SPB. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
